main event: Observers reported a sighting of one object appearing to be the size of a basketball held at arm's length, estimated to be flying at around 10,000 feet, which gained speed to approximately 1,000 MPH.
interesting points: The object was described as being similar in color to an aircraft., The sighting lasted for about two minutes., The object was first seen at about 53Â° above the horizon., Observers were initially attracted by a jet aircraft before noticing the object., The conclusion indicates the object was resolved as a possible aircraft but insufficient data was available for a definitive evaluation.
sighted object: one object estimated to be the size of a basketball
witness description: observers described the object and its characteristics during telephonic interviews
